data.label: دستیار جدید
data.instructions:
Read every text message that a user sends in Telegram.

If the message contains #blog, take the full text and append it into the Google Document with ID = 1i7VRzLesQGVpm_bKznVGbARx30phq83yEDIBACZ9lXk.

If the message contains #news, take the full text and append it into the Google Document with ID = 
134-SrAQKIFfD5Jn3jRThzJChpz2rC-w8epT7FYx9khg.

If the message contains #product, take the full text and append it into the Google Document with ID = 1Ma9lNi3JCRc_Msw7uNHCyzKnJxgAOZBUVpuL-oXaSpI.

After appending, send a confirmation message back to the user in Telegram indicating which document the text was saved to.

After posting the message in the correct Google Doc, log the action in a Google Sheet with this ID:
1DV32nhAtChPx0-lF9bm3OU5sgS9IWGAna19xjCw9C0w

Spreadsheet ID: 1DV32nhAtChPx0-lF9bm3OU5sgS9IWGAna19xjCw9C0w

Range: AI Playground Sheet1!A:B

Values:

In the column title, write a short summary of what the message was about or what action was taken (e.g., “Added to Blog Doc”).

In the column date, write the current date and time when the action was performed.

Example:
title → Added in Blog Doc
date → 2025. Aug. 23

Optionally, send a confirmation message back to the user in Telegram indicating which document the text was saved to and that it has been logged.
